content: **crocheted baskets in 2 strands drops bomull-lin theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #frostedlinenbasket drops design pattern l-180 yarn group c + c or e ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** piece measures approx large basket diameter = 20 cm height = 11 cm small basket diameter = 14 cm height = 8 cm **yarn** drops bomull-lin from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 150-100 g colour 11 beige 50-50 g colour 02 off white big basket weighs approx 165 g small basket weighs approx 70 g **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 6 mm **crochet gauge** 12 double crochets in width and 12 row vertically with 2 strands on hook size 6 = 10 x 10 cm note remember that hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger hook if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller hook
